title: cultural_data_EPIC_The_Irish_Emigration_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ettsolutions.museoarcheologico.
Application Name: EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum.
Number of Reviews: 31.00.
Application Description: EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum is an interactive experience and the world’sfirst digital museum, located in Dublin, Ireland. It will guide you on a journey to discover the stories of Irish emigration around the world, from early times to the modern day. At EPIC you can step through 20 themed galleries to find out why people left, see how they influenced the world they found, and experience the connection between their descendants andIreland today.Our app further enhances our visitors experience as they journey through our galleries. It offers an audio guide (in English) that helps guide visitors through each gallery. It provides users with further stories and information on the characters and historical events covered in our galleries. It also allows users to stay up-to- date with all our upcoming special events and lectures..
Number of Characters in Description: 839.00.
Overall Rate: 4.40.
First Page Reviews: Outstanding, It is a must in Dublin A great museum that is very original in it's interactive exhibits and well  worth an entry. It takes about 90 minutes to pass through and this app  replaces the audio guide that you can rent at the museum. It basically only  does that though and hopefully they will find more useful things to do with...Full Review A great museum that is very original in it's interactive exhibits and well  worth an entry. It takes about 90 minutes to pass through and this app  replaces the audio guide that you can rent at the museum. It basically only  does that though and hopefully they will find more useful things to do with  the app, but for now as an audio guide it works well..
